## About Me

I'm **Zain**, an **Applied Statistics** student at the **University of Toronto**, with minors in **Computer Science** and **Mathematics**. I focus on **Data Analytics** and **Data Visualization**, applying statistical methods and analytical tools to extract insights and support data-driven decisions. I'm building toward a career in **Data Science** and applied analytics.
:::

::: {.about-section-card}
### Current Work

I'm currently a **Data Analyst Intern** at **African Geospace**, working on the **Wholeviz** project—a data visualization platform helping NGOs, journalists, and public teams turn datasets into interactive dashboards. My work focuses on **data quality, validation, and QA** for data pipelines, ensuring analytical correctness and proper handling of edge cases in joins and transformations. I collaborate with analysts and engineers to bridge data logic with user-facing behavior, using frontend skills to enhance the visualization experience.

<script>
/**
 * Card Entrance Animation
 * 
 * Handles scroll-triggered animations for content cards:
 * 1. Cards fade in and slide up when they enter the viewport
 * 2. Border animation follows after a short delay
 * 
 * Uses IntersectionObserver for performance and smooth animations
 */
(function() {
  'use strict';
  
  const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.about-intro-card, .about-section-card, .experience-card, .project-card');
  
  // Fallback for browsers without IntersectionObserver support
  if (!('IntersectionObserver' in window)) {
    cards.forEach(function(card) {
      card.classList.add('card-visible', 'border-animated');
    });
    return;
  }
  
  // Observer for card entrance animation
  const cardObserver = new IntersectionObserver(function(entries) {
    entries.forEach(function(entry) {
      if (entry.isIntersecting) {
        const card = entry.target;
        
        // Step 1: Make card visible (fade in + slide up)
        card.classList.add('card-visible');
        
        // Step 2: After card appears, trigger border animation
        setTimeout(function() {
          card.classList.add('border-animated');
        }, 300); // 300ms delay after card appears
        
        cardObserver.unobserve(card);
      }
    });
  }, {
    threshold: 0.2, // Trigger when 20% of card is visible
    rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px' // Start animation slightly before card fully enters
  });
  
  // Observe all cards
  cards.forEach(function(card) {
    cardObserver.observe(card);
  });
})();

/**
 * Progress Bar Animation
 * 
 * Animates the degree progress bar when it enters the viewport.
 * Delayed to start after the first KPI card animation completes for better visual flow.
 */
(function() {
  'use strict';
  
  // Fallback for browsers without IntersectionObserver support
  if (!('IntersectionObserver' in window)) {
    document.querySelectorAll('.progress-bar').forEach(function(bar) {
      const progress = bar.getAttribute('data-progress');
      if (progress) {
        setTimeout(function() {
          bar.style.width = progress + '%';
        }, 100);
      }
    });
    return;
  }
  
  const progressObserver = new IntersectionObserver(function(entries) {
    entries.forEach(function(entry) {
      if (entry.isIntersecting) {
        const bar = entry.target;
        const progress = bar.getAttribute('data-progress');
        
        if (progress && !bar.classList.contains('animated')) {
          bar.classList.add('animated');
          // Delay progress bar to start after first card entrance animation completes
          // First card delay (300ms) + card animation (600ms) = 900ms, then add small delay
          setTimeout(function() {
            bar.style.width = progress + '%';
          }, 1000); // Start after first card animation completes with small delay
        }
        
        progressObserver.unobserve(bar);
      }
    });
  }, {
    threshold: 0.3,
    rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
  });
  
  document.querySelectorAll('.progress-bar').forEach(function(bar) {
    progressObserver.observe(bar);
  });
  
  /**
   * KPI Card Entrance Animation
   * 
   * Handles staggered entrance animations for KPI cards:
   * 1. Cards fade in and slide up with staggered delays (300ms base + 200ms per card)
   * 2. Shimmer effect sweeps across each card after the fade-in completes
   * 3. Hover effects are enabled after all animations complete
   */
  const kpiObserver = new IntersectionObserver(function(entries) {
    entries.forEach(function(entry) {
      if (entry.isIntersecting) {
        const card = entry.target;
        const index = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.kpi-card')).indexOf(card);
        
        // Add initial state class (invisible, slightly below)
        card.classList.add('kpi-initial');
        
        // Trigger entrance animation with staggered delay
        // Base delay (300ms) + staggered delay per card (200ms)
        setTimeout(function() {
          card.classList.remove('kpi-initial');
          card.classList.add('kpi-animating');
          
          // Remove animating class after all animations complete to allow hover
          // Card animation (0.6s) + shimmer delay (1.1s) + shimmer duration (0.8s) = 2.5s total
          setTimeout(function() {
            card.classList.remove('kpi-animating');
          }, 2500); // Wait for shimmer to complete
        }, 300 + (index * 200)); // Base 300ms delay + 200ms stagger between each card
        
        kpiObserver.unobserve(card);
      }
    });
  }, {
    threshold: 0.2,
    rootMargin: '0px 0px -30px 0px'
  });
  
  // Initialize all KPI cards in initial state
  document.querySelectorAll('.kpi-card').forEach(function(card) {
    card.classList.add('kpi-initial');
    kpiObserver.observe(card);
  });
})();

/**
 * Experience Card Flip Functionality
 * 
 * Enables click/tap to flip experience cards, revealing additional details on the back.
 * Handles both mouse clicks and touch events for mobile devices.
 * Prevents accidental flips from swipes or long presses.
 */
(function() {
  'use strict';
  
  // Wait for DOM to be ready
  function initFlipCards() {
    const experienceCards = document.querySelectorAll('.experience-card');
    
    if (experienceCards.length === 0) {
      // Retry if cards aren't loaded yet
      setTimeout(initFlipCards, 100);
      return;
    }
    
    experienceCards.forEach(function(card) {
      // Handle click/touch events
      function handleFlip(e) {
        // Prevent event bubbling
        e.stopPropagation();
        
        // Only allow flip after card is visible
        if (card.classList.contains('card-visible')) {
          card.classList.toggle('flipped');
          // Mark card as interacted to hide indicator
          card.classList.add('card-interacted');
        }
      }
      
      // Click event for desktop
      card.addEventListener('click', handleFlip);
      
      // Touch event for mobile (prevent double-tap zoom)
      let touchStartTime = 0;
      let touchStartX = 0;
      let touchStartY = 0;
      
      card.addEventListener('touchstart', function(e) {
        touchStartTime = Date.now();
        touchStartX = e.touches[0].clientX;
        touchStartY = e.touches[0].clientY;
      });
      
      card.addEventListener('touchend', function(e) {
        const touchDuration = Date.now() - touchStartTime;
        const touchEndX = e.changedTouches[0].clientX;
        const touchEndY = e.changedTouches[0].clientY;
        const deltaX = Math.abs(touchEndX - touchStartX);
        const deltaY = Math.abs(touchEndY - touchStartY);
        
        // Only flip on quick tap (not long press or swipe)
        if (touchDuration < 300 && deltaX < 10 && deltaY < 10) {
          e.preventDefault();
          handleFlip(e);
        }
      });
    });
  }
  
  // Initialize when DOM is ready
  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFlipCards);
  } else {
    initFlipCards();
  }
})();

/**
 * Profile Headline Injection
 * 
 * Dynamically adds a professional headline/subtitle under the profile name.
 * Styled similar to LinkedIn profile headlines for a professional appearance.
 */
(function() {
  'use strict';
  
  function addProfileHeadline() {
    const titleBlock = document.querySelector('.quarto-title-block');
    const titleMeta = document.querySelector('.quarto-title-meta');
    
    if (!titleBlock || !titleMeta) {
      setTimeout(addProfileHeadline, 100);
      return;
    }
    
    // Check if headline already exists
    if (titleMeta.querySelector('.about-headline')) {
      return;
    }
    
    // Create headline element
    const headline = document.createElement('div');
    headline.className = 'about-headline';
    headline.textContent = 'Data Analyst Intern at African Geospace';
    
    // Insert after title, before links
    titleMeta.appendChild(headline);
  }
  
  // Initialize when DOM is ready
  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', addProfileHeadline);
  } else {
    addProfileHeadline();
  }
})();

/**
 * Profile Image Lazy Loading
 * 
 * Implements lazy loading and fade-in animation for the profile image.
 * Improves initial page load performance and provides smooth visual feedback.
 */
(function() {
  'use strict';
  
  function initProfileImage() {
    const profileImage = document.querySelector('.about-image');
    
    if (!profileImage) {
      // Retry if image isn't loaded yet
      setTimeout(initProfileImage, 100);
      return;
    }
    
    // Add lazy loading attribute if not already present
    if (!profileImage.hasAttribute('loading')) {
      profileImage.setAttribute('loading', 'lazy');
    }
    
    // Mark as loaded once image finishes loading
    if (profileImage.complete) {
      profileImage.classList.add('loaded');
    } else {
      profileImage.addEventListener('load', function() {
        profileImage.classList.add('loaded');
      });
      
      // Fallback: mark as loaded after a timeout
      setTimeout(function() {
        profileImage.classList.add('loaded');
      }, 2000);
    }
  }
  
  // Initialize when DOM is ready
  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initProfileImage);
  } else {
    initProfileImage();
  }
})();
</script>
